pages.text: Eunotosaurus is a Permian reptile that could possibly have been related to turtles or parareptiles. It had wide and flat ribs which looked like a primitive turtle shell however, it is possible that these turtle like features evolved separately and it may not have been a primitive turtle relative at all.
